name: A Wet Day In Hell
description:
A Wet Day In Hell

The recess bell has rung; now the demonic onslaught has begun! Defend yourself from the children of Satan with... water balloons? I suppose if they're filled with holy water that might just do the trick.

Can you survive the hordes and make your way up to Heaven? There's only one way to find out...

=== STEAM VR REQUIRED!!!=== Credits:
